text:
I am using the "form embed code" for one of the forms in the following way.
```
hbspt.forms.create({
        portalId: '',
        formId: '',
        cssRequired: ''
      });```
However, the page does not get listed among the pages where the form is in use.
Is there a way to make it possible?

You can include the `pageId` param per the doc here <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options> (this assumes you are talking about HubSpot hosted pages, if this is about non-HubSpot hosted pages, this isnâ€™t possible)
<@USRE524EA>

Thanks for your reply <@UFBNA9K9A>! I understand. It is a HubSpot hosted page that I am using.

I tried that `pageId` but it does not seem to help.
Just did some new submissions to test it.
I still see "No HubSpot page" in the Appears On column for that form.
hmm, can you send me a link to the page so I can see what might be going on?
